Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 4th overall pick, by Miami in 2014...
Injured on 4/27/2014 with a Blister On Finger, out for 4 days...
Injured on 7/24/2015 with a Blister On Finger, out for 5 days...
Injured on 7/27/2015 with a Strained Bicep Tendon, out for 3 weeks...
Traded from Miami to Pittsburgh on 1/30/2016 (Going to PIT: 3B Carlos Belen, SS Jiovanni Mier. Going to MIA: 3B Pedro Alvarez)...
Injured on 5/9/2016 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for one week...
Injured on 8/18/2016 with a Bruised Finger, out for 4 days...
Injured on 5/26/2017 with a Strained Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
Injured on 8/5/2017 with a Broken Wrist, out for full season...
Had first career hit on 4/11/2018, off Mat Latos (CIN)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/13/2018, off C.J. Edwards (CHC)...
Was selected to the 2019 Allstar game...
Injured on 10/22/2019 with a Pulled Achilles Tendon, out for 6 weeks...
Won World Series with Pittsburgh in 2019...
1/31/2021: Gets a new one-year contract worth $2,564,286 through salary arbitration...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/22/2021, hitting .579 with 5 HR, 8 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 6/1/2021, hitting .371 with 8 HR, 22 RBI...
Was selected to the 2021 Allstar game...
Injured on 7/23/2021 with a Inflamed Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
1/31/2022: Gets a new one-year contract worth $3,328,571 through salary arbitration...
Drove in 6 runs against Milwaukee on 5/12/2022...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/3/2022, hitting .433 with 4 HR, 10 RBI...
Was selected to the 2022 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/28/2022, hitting .542 with 0 HR, 7 RBI...
1/31/2023: Gets a new one-year contract worth $3,942,857 through salary arbitration...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/19/2023, hitting .500 with 4 HR, 9 RBI...
Was selected to the 2023 Allstar game...
10/24/2023: Signed a contract extension with Pittsburgh, $13,700,000 per year, for 7 years.
Won Gold Glove at Shortstop in 2024...
Hit 3 homeruns against Philadelphia, driving in 6 runs on 4/5/2026...
Won Batter of the Month award on 6/1/2026, hitting .374 with 7 HR, 25 RBI...
Was selected to the 2026 Allstar game...
Had 5 hits with 5 RBI against Arizona on 9/28/2027...
Hit 3 homeruns against Arizona, driving in 5 runs on 9/28/2027...
Won Gold Glove at Shortstop in 2027...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/3/2028, hitting .483 with 5 HR, 10 RBI...
Was selected to the 2028 Allstar game...
Traded from Pittsburgh to Cincinnati on 1/31/2029 (Going to PIT: P Jairo Labout, SS James Gadberry. Going to CIN: SS Carlos Belen, P Mateo Deguzman)...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against San Diego on 9/19/2029...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/10/2030, hitting .500 with 1 HR, 7 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 8/1/2030, hitting .367 with 5 HR, 25 RBI...

10/29/2030: Signed a contract extension with Cincinnati, $10,000,000 per year, for 3 years.
